Enenral, ore or iraivanait tavira veru iraivan illave illai. (Akave, ivvaru) avarkal kuruvatiliruntu vilakik kollavittal avarkalil (allahvai) nirakarippavarkalai tunpuruttum vetanai niccayamaka vantataiyum
